Results of a run of the program are below.
The sample test file is loaded first. Then a random graph is created and used for test.
The whole implementation is found in graph.h. It was kept in the header due to the highly templated code.
Kruskal was used for MST computation.

Compiled on a Kubuntu 13.04 workstation, gcc (Ubuntu/Linaro 4.7.3-1ubuntu1) 4.7.3.


dragosh@reactoru:~/workspace/c++forc/hw3$ ./main
